column1: Askitheno chokkat monu sethe meni me hovdu
Tu ave athudu mogo sondos avudraas
Thora khes chokkat kaala ken se
Ouraa ambo holo jhukku praamom sethe
Ouraa dhadha kobeem mogo gullayo kadhi dhen
Mogo horaad kelno meni jhukku aasthe
Moro dhollam tu kobeem onde chokkat meni ken rai
Me kaathavel aski thettam um sethe kaithavu
Hunno dhino vel ice cream kaathe chode laave
Elle dongar unju jeeyathi chokkat dekkaey
Thego dolo chokkat singaar ken se
Elle payasam chokkat rucci ken se
Elle pongal tu kerithe chod hodes
Elle piljar vasuno vera level ken se
Elle pani peeyedi angu chokkat lave
Elle chudidhar um tu chokkat dekaaras
Elle angidi um kaas aski unno thaven
Singaeddi sengadi bhaarad jaate mogo oppai
Bei, ella salvo thungo chokkat dekaaras
Elle angidi um katheyo chod abbe
Onde item kaadedhi, aunde item goes abbe
Chokkat kalagasur abbe unno kaas um
Thora naak chokkat naano ken singaar ken se
Mogo ella mutton ounty ven oppai
Tu haasatevel mogo sondos ken laavaras
Singaeedi um, thogo sengadi vaathakerathe mogo jhukko oppai
vambudimbu neenatha chokkat bedki ken se
Tu lotta reyedde mogo chokkat lavaaras
Enno chokkat kai thegichi aangu chokkat se
Elle nanna suno singaar ken se
Me monnu jhukku dhayiryam ken tholu
Thora sangaadi kobeem rathe mogo aasthe sethe
Enno yadeem raag aviliyo me seertheni
Enno kobeem athudu meni bathi hovde
Eggo chokkat budhi se meni kalaaras
Eggo thone kobeem photo um chokkat pode
Thora sangaadi reeyadi mogo ammaedi ken lavaaras
Thele dhendo thora gelam chokkat dekaaras
Enno ammaedi bedki singaar vera se
Enno monnum kobeem chokkat yo hovde
Pos podethe vel onde padam bithir saate chod laave
Elle meni lotta jeeyadi, vasuno onde madari avares
Angidi kobeem menkan raan. Mogo oppana!
Akaas mobbu ken se,. Mogo opparyanee
Radhi thani ken ratha mogo dhaak kerey
Kobeem mogo erichaal kele rai ya?
Tu ave athudu mogo rod avaraas
Thora khes phanta khes madiri se
Thone thel ure madiri dekaaras, chod nee
Tu bhendu madiri paskud jeele se
Angu gulleyo kayethee aisthu madiri dekaey
Thoro lotta avedi gonduru vasuno avaraas
Elle ghamma kuppo kuppo ken se
Kodi madiri noi noi ken kele rai ya?
raan behys madiri chuttufiley rai ya?
Kona kai toro munda um hinguna
Tora vaathoa aakathavel mogo dhosku dhunno avude
Tu kobeem vetti vatho keley rai ya?
Onde bedki jhaad madiri se ya?
Kuppo angu thayedi melli thogo chod dekhaana
Thone seeyadi atho hudi avarthe madiri dekhaaras
Tu kobeem ghendo waste kele rai ya
Tu keni sangathe vel mogo raag avaraas
Onde naano pilla melli thora somur chokkat com keray
Tu onde solai kudi madiri dhekaaras
Thele bedko kaan aikannathe madiri rai
Elle bedki vatha kerethevel mogo nerambu uchai
Tu hasatha vel pisi madiri se
Tu chalethe vel uloga full kalai
Thone seeyadi aangu dhuurthe madiri dhekaaranee
Bhaat maviyor theno melli thora somaar chokkat kerey
Thora munde um koni dhaamuna ya?
Me thora holo raag ken sethe
Elle tu meneyo, ondamaari lavaaranee ya?
Mora dholo vedur sodi bhaarad ja
Thego sengaadi cheridhi naja guno avude.
Thelle bedki dholo seeyadi saap madiri se
Kondhi esani dhovro avan ya? Chokkae machi ja!
Senian mathri kobeem himcho kelle se
Elle bedko kobeem chod neenatha vaatha kere
Amba raag ken reeyadi mogo dhaakae
Tu handeyo mogo ovo melli oppayanee
Ikka val menithe melli, thego purunjuna
Esani kaayathee pod bhono mathiri hoyey
Tu vaatha kerathavel mora dhosko dhuukaraas
Enno ghommo kuppa thothi mathiri tholirai
Tu kanadee thalyedi pisi madiri dekaaras
Kobeem enno thaapu thaapu ken keray
Sunno mathiri kaathele ra meni sodraathe
